SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT j.* FROM (SELECT r.*, t.teacher_name, s.student_name, s.student_email, c.reply_status FROM (SELECT * FROM review WHERE academy_id=#{academyId}) r INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM teacher WHERE academy_id=#{academyId}) t ON r.teacher_id = t.teacher_id INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM student WHERE academy_id=#{academyId}) s ON r.student_id = s.student_id INNER JOIN (SELECT review_re_ref, COUNT(CASE WHEN review_re_lev > 0 THEN 1 END) AS reply_status FROM review WHERE academy_id=#{academyId} GROUP BY review_re_ref) c ON r.review_re_ref = c.review_re_ref WHERE r.review_re_lev=0 AND r.deleted_at IS null ) j
) c

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT r.* , t.teacher_name , s.student_name , s.student_email , c.reply_status FROM (SELECT * FROM review WHERE academy_id=#{academyId}) r INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM teacher WHERE academy_id=#{academyId}) t ON r.teacher_id = t.teacher_id INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM student WHERE academy_id=#{academyId}) s ON r.student_id = s.student_id INNER JOIN (SELECT review_re_ref , COUNT(CASE WHEN review_re_lev > 0 THEN 1 END) AS reply_status FROM review WHERE academy_id=#{academyId} GROUP BY review_re_ref) c ON r.review_re_ref = c.review_re_ref WHERE r.review_re_lev=0 AND r.deleted_at IS null ORDER BY r.review_re_ref DESC) j
) w LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT r.* , t.teacher_email , t.teacher_phone , t.teacher_name , s.student_email , s.student_name , c.course_name FROM (SELECT * FROM review WHERE academy_id=#{academyId}) r INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM teacher WHERE academy_id=#{academyId}) t ON r.teacher_id = t.teacher_id INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM student WHERE academy_id=#{academyId}) s ON r.student_id = s.student_id INNER JOIN (SELECT course_id ,course_name FROM course where academy_id=#{academyId}) c ON r.course_id = c.course_id WHERE r.review_re_ref = #{ref} ORDER BY r.review_re_lev
